attributes.action: You should have to opt out of Organ Donation and not opt in
attributes.additional_details:
Organ donation will help to save the lives of millions of millions of people every year.

However, people are too LAZY to sign up to be an organ donor even though they would be more than willing to be one. This is ludicrous and MUST be addressed.

Sign this petition if you too belive organ donation should be something you have to opt out of, rather than having to sign in. This will mean that hundreds of thousand of people will be donors, more organs will be available, thus saving millions more lives.

It is common sense to sign this petition!

Thank you
